hints.text: 🥛 I give you milk to drink.
🌱 I like to eat grass in the field.
⚫ I am often black and white.

animal.question: I say 'Woof, woof!' I love to play fetch. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🐕 I wag my tail when I am happy.
🏡 I protect your house.

animal.question: I say 'Meow!' and I like to chase mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I like to play with string.
💤 I love to nap in sunny spots.
🐈 I purr when you pet me.

animal.question: I go 'Oink, oink!' I like to roll in the mud. What am I?

hints.text: 🐖 I have a curly tail.
🐽 I have a big snout.
🐷 I live on a farm.

animal.question: I say 'Quack, quack!' I like to swim in the pond. What am I?

hints.text: 🦆 I have webbed feet.
🌾 I eat plants and seeds.
🌊 I float on the water.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
🐘 I am very big and strong.
🌴 I live in Africa and Asia.

animal.question: I am fluffy and say 'Baa!' What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I give you wool.
☘️ I eat grass in a field.
☁️ I am white and soft.

animal.question: I am yellow and say 'Cheep, cheep!' What am I?

hints.text: 🐣 I hatch from an egg.
🐛 I eat small insects.
🐥 I am a baby chicken.

animal.question: I am big and orange with black stripes. I roar loudly! What am I?

hints.text: 🐅 I am a type of big cat.
🌳 I live in the jungle.
🍖 I am a predator and eat meat.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I have brown spots on my body.
🌿 I am the tallest mammal on Earth.
🌍 I live in Africa.

bug.question: I'm little and slow, and leave a shiny trail. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I carry my house on my back.
🌿 I like to eat leaves in the garden.
🐌 I move very, very slowly.

bug.question: I have six legs and fly in the sky. I buzz around flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I make something sweet!
🐝 I live in a hive.
🌷 I collect nectar from flowers.

bug.question: I jump very high. I am green. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I like to live in grassy places.
🎶 I make a chirping sound.
🦵 I use my strong legs to jump.

bug.question: I have spots and fly. I'm red and black. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 People think I bring good luck.
🟢 I like to eat aphids in the garden.
⚫ I have a round body with black spots.

bug.question: I wiggle in the ground. Birds like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪱 I help the plants grow.
🌧️ I come out when it rains.
🍂 I live in the dirt.

bug.question: I make a home in the ground. I'm very small and work together. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I carry crumbs of food.
🏘️ I live in a colony.
💪 We are very strong for our size.

bug.question: I build a sticky web. I catch bugs to eat. What am I?

hints.text: 🕷️ I have eight legs.
🕸️ My home is made of silk.
🪰 I trap my food in my web.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar and then become something beautiful that flies. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have colourful wings.
🐛 First, I eat a lot of leaves.
🌸 I drink nectar from flowers.

bug.question: I like to fly around lights at night. People say my name like a scary sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🦇 I am nocturnal.
🌃 I like to come out when it's dark.
🦟 Some types of me can bite you.

bug.question: I have a hard shell and can be many colors. Some people collect me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪲 I am often found on plants.
🔒 My shell protects me.
🌈 I come in many different patterns and colors.
